name: Pizza Cafe VR (Oculus Quest 1 & 2)
description: Welcome to Pizza Cafe! One of my first few simulator games I've ever made! Pizza Cafe VR is a pizza store simulator where you build up money to buy upgrades to allow your pizza place to flourish! Purchase new toppings and additional ways to make more money like sodas. This game is currently in beta but will soon be featured on the app-lab store! Please leave me some feedback on my game to help improve the quality of my title.
